Name: Jesus
description:
Jesus Albeiro is skilled rancher from El Tambo, Cauca, who owns a two-hectare terrain that he acquired over 20 years ago. He currently cultivates more than 5,000 coffee plants, 1,000 tomato plants, 60 plantain trees, and a small plot of pea crops. Jesus employs organic based insecticides to protect his crops and has two regular buyers for his produce. He occasionally supports other local farmers during their harvest seasons with his skills and knowledge.

Jesus lives with his wife and three daughters in a house constructed some kilometers from the fields, and they actively assist with various agricultural tasks.

Jesus Albeiro is seeking a loan of $2,280,469 COP to purchase natural calcium-based fertilizers. These fertilizers will significantly improve the growth and overall health of his diverse crops.
